Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the Bais Tefila of Inwood to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes the Bais Tefila of Inwood to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Bais Tefila of Inwood to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
